utils (package)¶

Utility functions for thermal_history

Submodules¶

optimised_funcs (module)¶

Jit compiled replacements for numpy.linspace, numpy.polyval, scipy.integrate.cumulative_trapezoid

thermal_history.utils.optimised_funcs.jit_polyval(poly, x)[source]¶

Jit compiled version of np.polyval().

thermal_history.utils.optimised_funcs.linspace(x1, x2, n)[source]¶

Jit compiled version of numpy.linspace().

thermal_history.utils.optimised_funcs.polyval(poly, x)[source]¶
thermal_history.utils.optimised_funcs.trapezoid(x, y)[source]¶

Jit compiled version of scipy.integrate.cumulative_trapezoid(). Assumes initial=0.

utilities (module)¶

Further utility functions for checking parameters.

class thermal_history.utils.utilities.PackagePathFilter(name='')[source]¶

Bases: logging.Filter

Custom filter to extract just the pathname within the thermal_history package

filter()[source]¶

Determine if the specified record is to be logged.

Returns True if the record should be logged, or False otherwise. If deemed appropriate, the record may be modified in-place.

thermal_history.utils.utilities.check_parameters(parameters, method_names, required_params)[source]¶
